Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its worth to both of us, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $10800. This represents a significant saving compared to its full value of $12000, making it a fantastic deal for you. I believe this offer will not only be beneficial for you but also strengthen our relationship. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
